text: In this work we present Iterative HFold , a fast and robust iterative algorithm that matches the accuracy of the best existing pseudoknot prediction methods . Iterative HFold is significantly more accurate than IPknot while matching the accuracy of HotKnots on the HK - PK data set . Iterative HFold is superior to both IPknot and HotKnots on the IP - pk168 data set . Moreover both Iterative HFold and IPknot use less memory and run much faster than HotKnots on long sequences .
